Disaster relief from the U.S. Department of Agriculture could help farmers in upstate New York recover from property damage and livestock losses due to snow and ice build-up. The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover.'' One of the issues that precipitated this change[ of the CEO] was what happened in China. But China is not the cause-it's symptomatic of the broader disconnect between the way that Eric Schmidt wanted to run Google and the way the founders wanted to run the company, says David Wolf , chief executive of David Wolf Group Asia, a Beijing-based Mark Zuckerbergeting-strategy firm. But the biggest driver of the change seems to bLarry Page's long-term desire to be No. 1 at the company he started,
